name: Shape Spin
description:
*GAME CAN BE PLAYED ON BOTH PC AND MOBILE*

Made for Geojam 2022



GOAL:
A side of a shape will be randomly selected, and then rotated heavily 
You have to pick the correct side after the shape is rotated

CONTROLS:
Tap / Click
